materials.raw_text:
K2S (Potassium Sulfide) - 120 g 
 K2Sn (Potassium Stannate) - 80 g 
 Sn (Tin) - 160 g 
 S (Sulfur) - 40 g

sourcing.instructions:
K2S can be purchased from chemical supply companies or online chemical retailers. 
 K2Sn can be found in specialized materials suppliers or chemical distributors. 
 Tin can be sourced from metal suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 Sulfur is available at agricultural supply stores or online.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out the required amounts of K2S, K2Sn, Sn, and S using a precise digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine K2S and K2Sn thoroughly using a spatula. 
 3. Gradually add Sn to the mixture, ensuring even distribution. 
 4. Finally, add S and mix until a uniform powder is obtained.
